Changelog
=========

1.2 (2012-02-24)
------------------

* Implemented max. number of tags to be displayed (Suresh V)

1.1.1 (2011-10-28)
------------------

* Compatibility with Plone 4.1 added

1.1.0 (2011-01-04)
------------------

* Fresh tagcloud.swf added, with proper unicode support

1.0 (2009-04-24)
----------------

* Initial release
